trans-unit.source: Specifies the file format of the image.
Not inheritable.

The properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class indicate image formats such as bitmap (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Bmp%2A>), enhanced metafile (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Emf%2A>), and icon (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Icon%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Свойства <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> класс указать форматы изображений, например точечного рисунка (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Bmp%2A>), расширенный метафайл (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Emf%2A>) и значок (<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Icon%2A>).

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class to specify an image format when saving an image using the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Например, можно использовать свойства <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> класс, чтобы задать формат образа при сохранении изображения с помощью <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> метод.

trans-unit.source: You can compare two image formats by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Вы можете сравнить два формата образа с помощью <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Equals%2A> метод.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure that specifies a particular image format.
trans-unit.target: Структура <see cref="T:System.Guid" />, определяющая конкретный формат изображений.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Инициализация нового экземпляра класса <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> с использованием указанной структуры <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.

trans-unit.source: Typically you use the static properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> class to specify a particular format such as <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Png%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg%2A>, rather than constructing a new <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>.
trans-unit.target: Обычно использовать статические свойства <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat> класса, чтобы указать определенный формат, например <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Png%2A> или <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Jpeg%2A>, вместо создания нового <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bitmap (BMP) image format.
An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the bitmap image format.
Gets the enhanced metafile (EMF) image format.
An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the enhanced metafile image format.
The object to test.

Returns a value that indicates whether the specified object is an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that is equivalent to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает значение, определяющее, эквивалентен ли указанный объект <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> объекту <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that is equivalent to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает значение <see langword="true" />, если параметр <paramref name="o" /> является объектом <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" />, эквивалентным объекту <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" />; в обратном случае возвращается <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Exchangeable Image File (Exif) format.
An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the Exif format.
Returns a hash code value that represents this object.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает значение хэш-кода, представляющее данный объект.

trans-unit.source: A hash code that represents this object.
Gets the Graphics Interchange Format (GIF) image format.
An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the GIF image format.
Gets a <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure that represents this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure that represents this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object.
Gets the Windows icon image format.
An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the Windows icon image format.
Gets the Joint Photographic Experts Group (JPEG) image format.
An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the JPEG image format.
Gets the format of a bitmap in memory.
trans-unit.target: Получает формат точечных рисунков в памяти.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the format of a bitmap in memory.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" />, определяющий формат точечного рисунка в памяти.

trans-unit.source: Gets the W3C Portable Network Graphics (PNG) image format.
An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the PNG image format.
Gets the Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) image format.
An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the TIFF image format.
Converts this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object to a human-readable string.
trans-unit.target: Преобразует этот объект <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> в удобную для восприятия строку.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object.
Gets the Windows metafile (WMF) image format.
An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat" /> object that indicates the Windows metafile image format.
